items.sentence: Tom says he doesn\'t want to see Mary anymore.
My family is more important to me than my job.
My father and I sometimes go fishing together.
My father and my brother work in this factory.
This morning, I was woken up by the telephone.
This sort of work calls for a lot of patience.
Thousands of people wanted to know the answer.
We have no chance of winning the championship.
We ran out of gas in the middle of the desert.
We should ask Tom what he thinks we should do.
